item.title: Saradha scam ExAssam DGP under probe commits suicide
item.description: Former Assam director general of police DGP Shankar Barua who came under the CBI scanner for alleged involvement in the Saradha chit fund scam shot himself on Wednesday
item.itunes:subtitle: Former Assam director general of police DGP Shankar Barua who came under the CBI scanner for alleged involvement in the Saradha chit fund scam shot himself on Wednesday
item.itunes:summary: Former Assam director general of police DGP Shankar Barua who came under the CBI scanner for alleged involvement in the Saradha chit fund scam shot himself on Wednesday

item.title: Allahabad HC removes 11 judicial officers for violence
item.description: The officers who were undergoing a training at Lucknows Judicial Training Institute were involved in a fight during a farewell party in a hotel in Lucknow on September 8

item.title: Stay grounded Sena taunts BJP after bypoll reverses
item.description: The Shiv Sena on Wednesday took potshots at the BJP for the reverses suffered by it in the bypolls saying it should learn a lesson and keep its feet on the ground
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shiv Sena on Wednesday took potshots at the BJP for the reverses suffered by it in the bypolls saying it should learn a lesson and keep its feet on the ground
item.itunes:summary: The Shiv Sena on Wednesday took potshots at the BJP for the reverses suffered by it in the bypolls saying it should learn a lesson and keep its feet on the ground

item.title: Attack on Ujjain University VC VHP activists held
item.description: Ujjain Police on Wednesday arrested 11 Vishwa Hindu Parishad and Bajrang Dal activists for allegedly manhandling the vicechacellor of the Vikram University and vandalising his office on Monday
item.itunes:subtitle: Ujjain Police on Wednesday arrested 11 Vishwa Hindu Parishad and Bajrang Dal activists for allegedly manhandling the vicechacellor of the Vikram University and vandalising his office on Monday
item.itunes:summary: Ujjain Police on Wednesday arrested 11 Vishwa Hindu Parishad and Bajrang Dal activists for allegedly manhandling the vicechacellor of the Vikram University and vandalising his office on Monday

item.title: Muzaffarnagar riots compensation to 203 more people
item.description: Two hundred three more peoplewho were displaced during last years Muzaffarnagar riots will get compensation after the Uttar Pradesh government accepted their claims on the recommendation of district authorities
item.itunes:subtitle: Two hundred three more peoplewho were displaced during last years Muzaffarnagar riots will get compensation after the Uttar Pradesh government accepted their claims on the recommendation of district authorities
item.itunes:summary: Two hundred three more peoplewho were displaced during last years Muzaffarnagar riots will get compensation after the Uttar Pradesh government accepted their claims on the recommendation of district authorities

item.title: Two militants killed in an encounter near LoC
item.description: Two militants were on Wednesday killed in an encounter with security forces near the Line of Control in Macchil Sector of Kashmir Valley Two AK47 rifles and one UBGL along with other warlike stores were recovered from the site
item.itunes:subtitle: Two militants were on Wednesday killed in an encounter with security forces near the Line of Control in Macchil Sector of Kashmir Valley Two AK47 rifles and one UBGL along with other warlike stores were recovered from the site
item.itunes:summary: Two militants were on Wednesday killed in an encounter with security forces near the Line of Control in Macchil Sector of Kashmir Valley Two AK47 rifles and one UBGL along with other warlike stores were recovered from the site

item.title: Narendra Modi turns 64 meets mother to seek blessings
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modinbspon Wednesday morning met his mother in Gandhinagar to seek her blessings and received calls from his Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe and President Pranab Mukherjee to wish him
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modinbspon Wednesday morning met his mother in Gandhinagar to seek her blessings and received calls from his Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe and President Pranab Mukherjee to wish him
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modinbspon Wednesday morning met his mother in Gandhinagar to seek her blessings and received calls from his Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe and President Pranab Mukherjee to wish him

item.title: 35 Jadavpur University students held for protest over molestation case
item.description: About 35 students who were protesting outside the Jadavpur University campus against the molestation of a woman student were arrested by the police on Wednesday TV reports said
item.itunes:subtitle: About 35 students who were protesting outside the Jadavpur University campus against the molestation of a woman student were arrested by the police on Wednesday TV reports said
item.itunes:summary: About 35 students who were protesting outside the Jadavpur University campus against the molestation of a woman student were arrested by the police on Wednesday TV reports said

item.title: Teacher recruitment at 6 AIIMS under cloud
item.description: A central inquiry committee has found major lapses in the recruitment of teachers for the six new AIIMS set up in different parts of the country holding the director of AIIMS Patna and a private firm responsible for the mess
item.itunes:subtitle: A central inquiry committee has found major lapses in the recruitment of teachers for the six new AIIMS set up in different parts of the country holding the director of AIIMS Patna and a private firm responsible for the mess
item.itunes:summary: A central inquiry committee has found major lapses in the recruitment of teachers for the six new AIIMS set up in different parts of the country holding the director of AIIMS Patna and a private firm responsible for the mess

item.title: Investments on agenda Modi to receive Chinese president Xi
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will spend his 64th birthday at a private dinner with Xi Jinping in Gujarat as the Chinese president begins a visit that will set the tone for relations between the two countries
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will spend his 64th birthday at a private dinner with Xi Jinping in Gujarat as the Chinese president begins a visit that will set the tone for relations between the two countries
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will spend his 64th birthday at a private dinner with Xi Jinping in Gujarat as the Chinese president begins a visit that will set the tone for relations between the two countries

item.title: Just ahead of Xi visit IndiaVietnam deal on Chinas mind
item.description: A day before President Xi Jinping lands in India China expressed concern over new oil exploration deals signed between New Delhi and Hanoi during President Pranab Mukherjees state visit to Vietnam Xi visit to India could set new paradigm in bilateral ties
item.itunes:subtitle: A day before President Xi Jinping lands in India China expressed concern over new oil exploration deals signed between New Delhi and Hanoi during President Pranab Mukherjees state visit to Vietnam Xi visit to India could set new paradigm in bilateral ties
item.itunes:summary: A day before President Xi Jinping lands in India China expressed concern over new oil exploration deals signed between New Delhi and Hanoi during President Pranab Mukherjees state visit to Vietnam Xi visit to India could set new paradigm in bilateral ties

item.title: JK floods Search begins for the missing
item.description: Anger and despair normal in such adverse conditions say psychiatrists visiting relief camps

item.title: In Mamatas land BJP wins first seat on its own
item.description: The BJP made inroads into West Bengal for the first time in 14 years by winning one of two assembly seats Tuesday and finishing second in the other bucking a trend in the rest of the country where it suffered reverses
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJP made inroads into West Bengal for the first time in 14 years by winning one of two assembly seats Tuesday and finishing second in the other bucking a trend in the rest of the country where it suffered reverses
item.itunes:summary: The BJP made inroads into West Bengal for the first time in 14 years by winning one of two assembly seats Tuesday and finishing second in the other bucking a trend in the rest of the country where it suffered reverses

item.title: Bypoll results More than 50 say Modi magic still exists
item.description: Despite the drubbing of the saffron party in the justconcluded bypolls more than 50 respondents in a HT poll on Tuesday said that the country was still under the spell of the Modi wave
item.itunes:subtitle: Despite the drubbing of the saffron party in the justconcluded bypolls more than 50 respondents in a HT poll on Tuesday said that the country was still under the spell of the Modi wave
item.itunes:summary: Despite the drubbing of the saffron party in the justconcluded bypolls more than 50 respondents in a HT poll on Tuesday said that the country was still under the spell of the Modi wave
